task.title: Log In to Your Account on Oxygen Content Fusion
task.shortdesc: In this step, you will learn how to login on Oxygen Content Fusion.

taskbody.context: This task includes learning where to find the correct login link on Oxygen Content Fusion and how to log in with your Virginia Tech account

step.cmd: Go to https://carnage.clahs.vt.edu/. You should already have an account through the school, so no need to create one.
Log in with your Virginia Tech credentials.
